ComicInfo.Title: You Had One Job
ComicInfo.Summary: THE RETURN OF THE NEW FANTASTIC FOUR?! The events of EMPYRE threaten all life on Earth and the future balance of power throughout the cosmos! And the secret mission that the FF have placed into Valeria and Franklinâ€™s hands requires some big-league help!
ComicInfo.Characters: Alicia Masters, Captain Marvel, Franklin Richards, Human Torch, Invisible Woman, Jo-Venn, Mr. Fantastic, N'kalla, Sky, Spider-Man, Thing, Valeria Richards, Wolverine
ComicInfo.Teams: Cotati, Fantastic Four, Kree, New Fantastic Four, Skrulls
